content.question: In context, the first sentence of the eighteenth paragraph (“For Lena...unassisted”) serves primarily to

choices.label: verify the accuracy of the author’s self-perception by closely considering a relevant example
equate the author’s opportunities as a writer with the opportunities available to athletes with disabilities
connect the author’s insights about her professional life to her broader experiences as a person with cerebral palsy
cite evidence to definitively disprove critics’ assertions about the author’s limitations as a writer

content.answer: connect the author’s insights about her professional life to her broader experiences as a person with cerebral palsy

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
